title: Orin Meditations - The Millennium Journeys by Orin - Part 2
description:
Meditations by Orin and Sanaya Roman

The Millennium Journeys by Orin
 Volume 2: Expanding Your Consciousness

Program 1 Receiving Light From the Solar AngelsÃƒÂ¢??Receive energy and light from the Solar Angels into the permanent atoms of your soul to build a more refined mental, emotional, and physical body.

Program 2 Blending With the MasterÃƒÂ¢??Meet the Master who has been guiding you throughout your lifetime. Receive transmissions of light from this Master to assist you in seeing more of your path and purpose.

Program 3 Liberating Spirit From MatterÃƒÂ¢??Meet the World Teacher of Love who transmits the light of Sirius to you to free your spirit, allowing you to take your next evolutionary step of becoming a being of light.

Program 4 Harmonizing With 7 Qualities of WillÃƒÂ¢??The World Teacher of Will transmits the seven qualities of will from the Great Bear to you to transform your being at every level.

Program 5 Aligning With the Higher WillÃƒÂ¢??Receive the electrical energy of Higher Will from a very high being to assist you in living in alignment with the higher forces of the universe.

Program 6 Creating Balance and FlowÃƒÂ¢??Work with the Master of Flow to integrate all the light you have received, and to balance and align your chakras.

Program 7 Knowing Your Soul&#039;s WillÃƒÂ¢??Create a triangle of light between your heart, head, and ajna centers to align your personality with your soul and to know your soul&#039;s will.

Program 8 Expanding Your IntuitionÃƒÂ¢??Travel into the plane of intuition, learn the two triangles of light that create mental illumination and emotional clarity, and open your intuition for true knowing that goes beyond the intellect.

Program 9 Exploring Levels of ConsciousnessÃƒÂ¢??Build your channel upward and merge with higher dimensions of yourself to know yourself in new ways. Receive gifts of light and expanded consciousness from these higher levels.

Program 10 Gaining a Soul PerspectiveÃƒÂ¢??Join with your soul to view your life from its perspective so you can experience more of your soul&#039;s purpose, rhythm, and light in your life.

Program 11 Experiencing the Mind of God-Expand your consciousness as you blend with the soul of the earth, the Solar light (the soul of the sun), and finally with the mind of God.

Program 12 Linking With the Great OnesÃƒÂ¢??Link with the Great Ones who are transmitting light to humanity. Receive light into your head, heart, and throat centers to accelerate your evolution, and to manifest your higher path and purpose.
